entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , 100 Mile House
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:24 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Clinton 01:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -3.8°C
Pressure: 102.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 90 %

Dewpoint: -5.2°C
Wind: SE 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets beginning early in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing rain. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
